Retrieve investors in secondary pools
@param  poolId  pool identity

Gets transfer agent for the security in the trade
@param  security  address of security traded

Fetch trading fee collected in Balancer vault
@param  _token  address of token in which fee is collected
@dev This helper function is a fast and cheap way to convert between IERC20[] and IAsset[] types

@dev Returns a scaling factor that, when multiplied to a token amount for `token`, normalizes its balance as if
 it had 18 decimals.

@dev Reverses the `scalingFactor` applied to `amount`, resulting in a smaller or equal value depending on
 whether it needed scaling or not. The result is rounded down.

@dev Applies `scalingFactor` to `amount`, resulting in a larger or equal value depending on whether it needed
 scaling or not.

attributes.text:
Gets transfer agent for the security in the trade
@param  security  address of security traded

Fetch trading fee collected in Balancer vault
@param  _token  address of token in which fee is collected
@dev This helper function is a fast and cheap way to convert between IERC20[] and IAsset[] types

@dev Returns a scaling factor that, when multiplied to a token amount for `token`, normalizes its balance as if
 it had 18 decimals.

@dev Reverses the `scalingFactor` applied to `amount`, resulting in a smaller or equal value depending on
 whether it needed scaling or not. The result is rounded down.

@dev Applies `scalingFactor` to `amount`, resulting in a larger or equal value depending on whether it needed
 scaling or not.

params.dpid: identifier of depository participant (eg, transfer agent) that is authorized to settle the asset

params._token: address of token in which fee is collected

params._factory: reference to the secondary issue pool factory contract
params._issueFeePercentage: percentage of trading fee to be charged by the asset manager

params.cashAmount: amount of currency issued in pool
params.minSecurityOrder: minimum order size of securities issued in pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tradeToReport: data structure holding order matching data

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getSettlementRequest(bytes32).notice: Fetches a specific trade settlement request

getSettlementRequests(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Fetches trade settlement requests for depository participant

getTradingFeeCollected(address).notice: Fetch trading fee collected in Balancer vault

issueSecondary(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Joins existing (secondary) tokenized assets into pool by primary issue token holders

requestSettlement((bytes32,address,bytes.notice: Used by Secondary pools to request settlement for trades

setSettlementStatus(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Sets settlement status for trades executed
